last_episode_to_air.name: The Big Shift. Part 2
last_episode_to_air.overview: Mookie teams up with all the criminals in prison to bring down Atomic Puppet once and for all.

name: Atomic Puppet
overview: Superhero Captain Atomic suffers a setback as he is shaking hands with Joey, a 12-year-old fan, when his disgruntled sidekick transforms him into a powerless puppet. The suddenly not-so-super superhero quickly realizes that the only way he can regain his former powers is to team up with the boy -- which is a dream come true for Joey but not so much for Captain Atomic. Together, the two form an unlikely and awkward partnership that allows them to become the city's newest superhero duo--known as Atomic Puppet.

episodes.name: Sick Day
episodes.overview: When Joey catches a cold, Mookie tries to take over as the city's top hero.
